QuestData.Title: A Savior for Lost Souls
QuestData.Description:
The forest sighs in greeting, Maw Walker.
Your arrival was written in the stars, and awaited by the boughs. Now our work begins.
Let us proceed.
Follow this path into the grove.
These are but the first steps on our journey together.
QuestData.LogDescription: Walk with the Warden to the grove.
QuestData.RewardText:
Your presence warms the grove.
Now we learn, and grow.

Objectives.Objective: Walk with the Warden to the grove
